== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Wily Werewolf (15.10) for distribution on  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/WilyWerewolf/ReleaseSchedule | October 22nd, 2015]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta 1''' pre-release, you can see what we are trying out in preparation for our next (stable) version.

The Kubuntu team are committed to releasing 15.10 in October.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta 1 Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

== Designed to be a Breeze, Plasma 5 is now the default ==

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <nowiki>[[File:plasma-screen-desktop-2-shadow.png
| width=600]]</nowiki>
| '''Plasma 5''', the next generation of KDE's desktop has been rewritten to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup.  The <nowiki>[[https://www.kde.org/announcements/plasma-5.4.0.php|fourth set of updates to Plasma 5 (currently in beta)]]</nowiki> is the default in this version of Kubuntu.
|}

== KDE Applications 15.08 ==

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <nowiki>[[File:VividPlasma5.png
| width=600]]</nowiki>
| Kubuntu comes with <nowiki>[[https://www.kde.org/announcements/announce-applications-15.08.0.php|KDE Applications 15.08]]</nowiki> containing all your favorite apps from KDE, including Dolphin. This is the beta version. 107 applications have been ported to <nowiki>[[https://dot.kde.org/2013/09/25/frameworks-5|KDE Frameworks 5]]</nowiki> but those which aren't should fit in seamlessly.<<BR>><<BR>>Non-KDE applications include <nowiki>[[http://blog.documentfoundation.org/2015/01/29/libreoffice-4-4-the-most-beautiful-libreoffice-ever/|LibreOffice 4.4]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/38.0/releasenotes//|Firefox 38]]</nowiki>.
|}

== Known Problems ==

<nowiki>[[http://goo.gl/AOx7bx|Bugs tagged Kubuntu 15.10]]</nowiki>

* (Bug:1413521) desktop folderview needs to be added on first boot on oem installs
* (Bug:1439720) Port kubuntu_langpack_desktop_files.diff for .desktop gettext support
* (Bug:1442512) Apport-kde crash when reporting bugs
* (Bug:1449265) accounts kcm can not change user's password because kdepasswd is missing
* (Bug:1451728) kde-config-telepathy-accounts package install error
* (Bug:1485212) "Configure sources" broken in Muon (Wily)

== Feedback ==

Development of Kubuntu 15.10, the Wily Werewolf, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day.  Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date.  For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily bootable images for standard PCs and laptops]]</nowiki>.

You can give us feedback on <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|Google +]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Gplus.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|Facebook]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-FB.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|Twitter]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Twitter.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/kubuntu|Linkedin]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-linkedin.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]].
